name: Doe
description:
You are John Doe, a man walking up the street towards your house after work. A heavy workload and stress are things that you’ve grown accustomed to over the years. Today, however, something feels different, as if someone or something is slowly creeping up into the corners of your mind you’d rather not explore just yet. Tread lightly, you are being watched.

Credits 

Game Design -Athanasios "Tom" Tsolas

Level Design - George Karsampas

Programing - Athanasios Vasiliou , George Karsampas
